Gavin Wray

Interview with InstantAtlas

17 November 2010

I was interviewed for a case study about how the West Midlands Regional Observatory uses InstantAtlas to visualise geographical data to provide better access to Local Area Agreement data.

Read the interview on instantatlas.wordpress.com [No longer online]
